topic.title: Communism
topic.body: Communism can't survive out of a lab.True or false ?

topic.title: Sites

topic.title: Turkish Discussion Group/Türkçe Tartışma Grubu
topic.body: Since we don't have Turkish forum on this site,I created a group for it temporarily./Bu sitede Türkçe forum olmadığı için bu grubu geçici olarak açtım.

1596284934_12BoU1NpWC9niVqBeRueg6Mox5Peh.body: WTF this is not true at all.I have lost 2 of my best friends because of COVID.People like you are fucking delusional.Jesus.

> [otbtechnologies7](#comment_57_1BULx3pdbqxqTWCSBvSQijujiHhXJT1D3w): What? Covid is real. No one said it isn't.

I didn't answer you.I know what you said.I answered the original post.

1589480365_1EgS5evb1aJWQuYS9kwn4jXyUgxfi.body: Their marketing is ass that's all.They just pop up everywhere and they are annoying as fuck.But the actual product is not half bad.

1596497359_12kkzRK2n9vRvQLcycbGZNsD3vqzW.body:
> [trickstar](#comment_6_1J6U7uZyNHj7BJEDHY7QfJL1V1SFQhZ7pJ): Not many can survive the wrath of Communism y'know...Take Soviet Russia as an example.

Soviet Russia doesn't exist today and there must be a reason behind it.Can you explain it a bit more ?
